job.title: Software Engineer III
job.description: stronguPosition Summary What Youll DobrbrustrongIf youre thinking scale think bigger and dont stop there At Walmart Global Tech we dont just innovate we enable transformations across stores and different channels for the Walmart experience Take a regular day at Walmart and match that with 260 million customers a week 11695 stores under 59 banners in 28 countries and ecommerce websites in 11 countries Thats Walmart Global Tech for youbrbrWalmart employs approximately 23 million associates worldwide We innovate to deliver a simple and seamless experience for our customers Our tech talent solves the biggest and most complex problems They drive digital transformation where data and analytics are enabling us to better serve our customers and create a digital relationship with them As our customers evolve and adapt we are taking it a few notches further here Were changing what customers can expect from the experience of shopping from the physical stores to mobile social and even online were not just ready for the future of shopping were creating itbrbrYoull sweep us off our feet ifbrulliYou have a deep interest and passion for technology liliYou love writing and owning code and enjoy working with people who will keep challenging you at every stage liliYou have strong problem solving analytic decisionmaking with interpersonal skills liliYou are selfdriven and motivated with entrepreneurial passion and desire to work in a fastpaced resultsdriven agile environment with varied responsibilities liliYou are innovative talented and committed individual with excellent communication spirit of teamwork and Analytical abilities to drive excellencebrliulstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliPrimarily responsible for delivering high quality technical designs and code for the product requirements in a fastpaced agile scrum environmentliliLead and participate in small to mediumscale projects by reviewing project requirements translating requirements into technical solutions gathering requested information for example design documents product requirements wire frames writing and developing code conducting unit testing communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders collaborating with project team and cross functional teams troubleshooting open issues and bugfixes ensuring ontime delivery and handoffs interacting with project manager to provide input on project plan and providing leadership to the project teamliliStrive for continuous improvement in efficiencyliliTroubleshoot business and production issues by gathering information for example issue impact criticality possible root cause engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues formulating an action plan performing actions as designated in the plan interpreting the results to determine further action performs root cause analysis to prevent future occurrence of issues and completing online documentationliliProvide support to the business by responding to users questions concerns and issues for example technical feasibility implementation strategies identifying short and longterm solutions facilitating resolutions and leading crossfunctional partnershipbrliulstronguAbout YoubrbrustrongYou have and can implement big ideas with a positive attitude You want to be a part of the team to disrupt this industry and you have these main skillsbrulliMust have strong knowledge amp handson experience building React Native apps on Android devicesliliExperience building customizable reusable and dynamic components using ReactJS React Hooks Redux JavaScript ES6 Typescript HTML CSS and NodeJSliliAbility to build products with focus on testability someone who loves test coverage well versed with using Jest and mocking frameworksliliExperience in automation testing using tools such as DetoxliliExperience in implementing UI analytics to report customer behavior and improve UI accordinglyliliExperience with project build with CICD pipelines through JenkinsliliA disciplined approach to development code review testing documentation and code structure in a team environmentliliA constant desire to improve learn more and take things to the next level and a passion for adopting the latest industry best practicesliliExperience with monitoring tools such as Dynatrace Splunk GrafanabrliulNice to HavebrulliExperience with GraphQL amp NextJSliliExperience with Cloud technologies Azure preferred amp KubernetesliliNative iOS or Android experience is a plusliul Minimum QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no minimum qualifications brbrememBachelors degree in Computer Science and 2 years experience in software engineering or related field OR 4 years experience in software engineering or related field Preferred QualificationsbrbrememOutlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position If none are listed there are no preferred qualifications brbrememMasters Computer Science Primary Location805 SE MOBERLY LN BENTONVILLE AR 72712 United States of America
